channel.title: R.I.P My dog
channel.description: There The vets put her down... after a battle with cancer... she got fluid on her lungs and now the vet has just put her down about 10-20 min ago. :( i thought id be ok but i keep getting tears i my eyes :S and my nose is all runny... not good.. 17 year old gettin upset :S

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:22, topic:116758”][quote author=Kmb link=topic=166075.msg1545811#msg1545811 date=1182885487]
What’s wrong with beer, Casey?
[/quote]
Alcohol is a depressant. I find it ironic that people drink lots when upset.[/quote]

Well actually by depressant it doesn’t actually mean it makes you depressed.

By that, it is meant that it stops the function of a specific area of the body. As far as I know, alcohol depresses the central nervous system, which causes the drunk feeling.

But like I said earlier, alcohol will only intensify emotions. Drinking while sad will only make you more sad, unless your doing something to keep your mind off of it. I don’t think drugs should be used to cure these types of problems anyways, just let time do it’s thing.

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Kmb:

What’s wrong with beer, Casey?

Alcohol is a depressant. I find it ironic that people drink lots when upset.

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @_CopyRight CopyRight
item.description:
@_CopyRight wrote:

My friends brother died by* train tracks, someone hit the back of his truck, people call the road “Roller coaster road” because its very curvy and bumpy.

The 2 months his cousin was driving and they were hit by a train.

They said the train goes by once a month

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Sorry to hear about that beanie… i have no idea what im going to be like when i have to put my lil brother down (my cat). Just cheer up, and despite what has been said above - it is ok to cry, and its good to cry.

But to cry constantly is stupid - just remember what your dog would think, she wouldn’t want you to cry. good luck.

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:17, topic:116758”][quote author=Bang Train link=topic=166075.msg1546680#msg1546680 date=1182898112]
My dads a vet…

Ive put about 5 animals to sleep so far…never really gets easier
[/quote]

It’s worse when you know the animal.

If my dog died i know for sure I’d cry but so what? Your pretty heartless if someone close to you dies and you dont really care.[/quote]
Im talking about 5 of my animals, i said it never gets easier putting them down. Its always sad

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

TheBeanie:

There The vets put her down… after a battle with cancer… she got fluid on her lungs and now the vet has just put her down about 10-20 min ago. i thought id be ok but i keep getting tears i my eyes :S and my nose is all runny… not good… 17 year old gettin upset :S

Thats the same way my cat died, I almost started crying. Sorry man… I know what it feels like. Try going to sleep for a bit, it should help.

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“Try Me, post:12, topic:116758”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=166075.msg1545972#msg1545972 date=1182888555]
Alcohol intensifies emotions though. If your sad and get drunk, it will probably make you more sad. If your angry, it’ll probably make you more angry, etc. Unless your with friends having fun.

Anyways sorry about your dog, I know how it feels.
[/quote]
Really? You have gotten put down before?

Ouch![/quote]
Obviously if you have any common sense you’d realize he’s saying he knows how it feels to have a pet put down.
If your trying to be funny, your not.

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P My dog
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:7, topic:116758”]That sucks.

Try to listen to some chill music (Sublime, Grateful Dead) and drink some beer. Crying never helped anybody but a good drunken rage will alienate your friends and family while making you feel alot better about your loss.[/quote]
